Line 59: Line 59:
===As WTBS===
===As WTBS===
â
[[Image:PerfectTBS.svg|thumb|120px|right|WTBS logo from 2004â2007. It was replaced locally when the station became WPCH, known as Peachtree TV.]]
 
After using the callsign WTCG for most of its first decade under Turner's ownership, the station became '''WTBS''' on August 27, 1979. The WTBS callsign had been held by the [[Massachusetts Institute of Technology]] radio station, but MIT agreed to cede the letters to Turner's station after Turner donated the money for a new transmitter for MIT's radio station, which is now known as [[WMBR (FM)|WMBR]].<ref>{{cite web|url=http://wmbr.mit.edu/history.html |title=WMBR history |publisher=Wmbr.mit.edu |date= |accessdate=2009-09-05}}</ref>
After using the callsign WTCG for most of its first decade under Turner's ownership, the station became '''WTBS''' on August 27, 1979. The WTBS callsign had been held by the [[Massachusetts Institute of Technology]] radio station, but MIT agreed to cede the letters to Turner's station after Turner donated the money for a new transmitter for MIT's radio station, which is now known as [[WMBR (FM)|WMBR]].<ref>{{cite web|url=http://wmbr.mit.edu/history.html |title=WMBR history |publisher=Wmbr.mit.edu |date= |accessdate=2009-09-05}}</ref>
